DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial compare rate de novo dyspareunia woman without vaginal dilator use follow surgery pelvic organ prolapse traditional posterior repair . Our hypothesis daily use vaginal dilator post-op week 4 week 8 posterior repair reduce rate de novo dyspareunia .
